roleset.name: phonetic reduction of 'hit' (strike)

example.name: the one example
example.text: When I was teaching there , the explanation invariably given by boys brought to me for scrapping in the playground was : “ Ee it oi , so oi it ee . ”

roleset.note: Identical to the frame for 'hit.01'. See VNcls bump-18.4, hit-18.1-1.
